text: Ukrainian company Precision Systems developed a miniaturized handheld version of AGS-17 called RGSh-30https://www.strategypage.com/htmw/htweap/20161108.aspx "in order to create a grenade launcher that could respond to the needs of Ukrainian units and special forces operating in the Donbass". RGSh-30 is designed to disable armored vehicles.http://www.thefirearmblog.com/blog/2016/10/18/im-sorry-ukrainian- firm-develops-handheld-automatic-grenade- launcher/https://www.richardcyoung.com/essential-news/ukrainian-firm-develops- handheld-automatic-grenade- launcher/https://www.unian.info/society/1579616-ukraine-presents-light- grenade-launcher-for-special-forces-in-donbas.html that can be carried like an assault rifle. RGSh-30 uses magazines with five 30mm VOG-17 grenades. Precision Systems plans to develop versions using 20mm, 25mm, and 40mm grenades. ==Users== * ==See also== *Neopup PAW-20 *RGS-50M *AGS-40 Balkan *RGM-40 Kastet *GM-94 *DP-64 *MRG-1 *Fort-600 ==References== Category:Weapons of Ukraine Category:Grenade launchers Category:Automatic grenade launchers
